tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_data (
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    energy_consumed DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (device_id, timestamp)
)

CREATE TABLE device_details (
    device_id INT,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    PRIMARY KEY (device_id)
)

CREATE TABLE anomaly_log (
    log_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    anomaly_type VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (log_id)
)

CREATE TABLE efficiency_report (
    report_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    efficiency_score DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (report_id)
)

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_data (
    device_id INT,
    date TIMESTAMP,
    energy_consumed DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (device_id, date)
)

CREATE TABLE device_details (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE anomalies_detected (
    anomaly_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    date TIMESTAMP,
    anomaly_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES device_details(device_id)
)

CREATE TABLE inefficient_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inefficient_reason VARCHAR(200)
)

CREATE TABLE anomaly_logs (
    log_id INT,
    anomaly_id INT,
    log_entry TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (anomaly_id) REFERENCES anomalies_detected(anomaly_id)
)
